text: Ruth "Dusty" Anderson (born December 17, 1918 - September 12, 2007), was an American actress and World War II pin-up girl. She was known for her roles in Crime Doctor's Warning (1945), which was one in the popular Crime Doctor series, and The Phantom Thief (1946). ==Movies== * Tonight and Every Night (1945) * Crime Doctor's Warning (1945) * The Phantom Thief (1946) ==References== ==Other websites== * * Dusty Anderson at the American Film Institute * Glamour Girls of the Silverscreen Category:1918 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Models from Ohio Category:Actors from Toledo, Ohio
title: Dusty Anderson
